title: Cloud Dragon Spawning In Mountain Rift
body:
God this patch wasn't even tested, was it?

4 drags and no soul lol

replies.body: Thanks for reporting this - was there a Shaco (or another champion with a clone that could possibly kill the dragon with a clone) in this game by any chance?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot King Cobra,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=X1cx9Yr2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-22T18:37:17.765+0000)
>
> Thanks for reporting this - was there a Shaco (or another champion with a clone that could possibly kill the dragon with a clone) in this game by any chance?

Yes, actually. i was playing Shaco.

"The first 3 dragons will be unique every time" 
"Dragons 3+ will all be the same"
"After killing the 2nd dragon the rift will turn into the 3rd dragons element"

Ive had a game where the 3rd dragon didnt even match what the rift turned to and even not get stats from dragons my team has killed. this is garbageeee
